step_of_the_day.title:
Holding the purpose of contributing to your community. Finding ways to contribute to your community (Pillar
            #3)
step_of_the_day.content:
A resilient community supports individual resilience. A resilient community is one in which there is a
            feeling of safety and connection. These qualities of harmony have a direct effect on the nervous system of
            the individuals who live in that society. A person who is resilient will hold the intention to contribute to
            making his or her community more resilient.

action_step:
Identify some action you can engage in to help make your community more resilient. Right now, all our
            communities are in the midst of elections. This is one area you may want to volunteer to support this
            process.
journal_entry: Write about how the peacefulness or conflict of your community affects you.
